title.en: I Became a Villainess in a Deadly Novel

altTitles.en: I Became the Villainess in a Disastrous Novel

altTitles.es-la: Soy la villana en una novela anticlimatica

altTitles.ru: Я стала злодейкой в романе с катастрофическим концом
Я стала злодейкой в новелле с катастрофическим концом
Я стала злодейкой в романе о смерти дракона

altTitles.ja: バッドエンド小説の悪女になりました

description.en:
I became a villainess in the novel I was reading. But this novel... Was a novel with an anticlimactic conclusion where the empire suddenly collapsed just before the ending! To hell with the original story! I have to try and survive first. Thus, I was just trying to flee to the neighboring country, but then…

“I’ve waited for 100 years just to meet you.”

The man who had hidden his identity as the Demon King and was the driving force behind the invasion. Grand Duke Arvis grabbed me with a gaze filled with intense emotions.

“If I lose you… I’d probably start by wiping out this continent that took you away from me.”

…Just why?

---
It's just Ara's luck to be hit by a car and reborn in a novel as the villainous "Meliara." To make things worse, she knows that the empire in this novel is about to get destroyed by the world's Demon King in a few months, so she must make a quick escape to the far corners of the empire while she can. She just can't catch a break! But as she's leaving, she runs into the dashing and mysterious Rehett, who, for some reason, immediately offers to accompany her on her journey as her bodyguard. What's stranger is that Rehett seems to know an awful lot about Meliara's tastes and preferences from her past life, despite meeting her for the first time. How could this be? Though she doesn't know it yet, Meliara's past and current lives are inextricably intertwined for a higher purpose beyond her imagination.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=933815), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5692463)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8917860), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=800828)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/i-became-the-villainess-in-a-disastrous-novel)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002765)
description.fr:
Je suis devenue la méchante du roman que je lisais, mais ce roman... avait la fin la plus décevante qu'on puisse imaginer. Après une longue et lente histoire d'amour, l'Empire était soudainement détruit par un démon le jour du mariage des deux protagoniste! Au diable l'histoire originale! Tout d'abord, je dois essayer de survivre, donc je veux fuir dans le pays voisin, mais...

«J'ai attendu 100 ans juste pour te rencontrer à nouveau.»

Avec un regard rempli d'émotions intenses, l'homme qui cachait sa véritable identité et qui était la force motrice de la destruction de l'Empire, m'avait attrapé.

«Si je te perds... Je commencerai probablement par anéantir ce continent qui t'a éloigné de moi.»

...Mais pourquoi?

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=933815), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5692463)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8917860), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=800828)
